General.Name: Baiyin Nonferrous Group Co Ltd
General.Description: Baiyin Nonferrous Group Co., Ltd. engages in the mining, smelting, processing, and trading of various non-ferrous metals in China. The company offers copper, lead, zinc, gold, and silver; nickel, tellurium, selenium, platinum, palladium, indium, rhenium, bismuth, and other products. Baiyin Nonferrous Group Co., Ltd. was founded in 1954 and is based in Baiyin, China.

2.Name: Mr. Long  Sun
2.Title: Deputy GM, Gen. Counsel & Sec. of the Board of Directors
